title: [SERIOUS TEAM] LF D4+ Top laner (Kings eSports)

embed.description: Some people have asked me if there will be a second team for the people who don't get in, if you're seriously interested in this, message me (MrNextgen) in game and I will try sort something out if I have enough people wanting spots. Cheers, have a good one!

body:
**Only one position available at this stage.**
Kings eSports Club is looking for top laners to tryout for the team.
Add **MrNextgen** on the client to setup a tryout.
The Link above will have the current team listed.

~Nicholas "Nextgen"
